fi.tuni.tamk.LabyrinthOfLife

Class MapGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.tamk.LabyrinthOfLife.MapGenerator

  • public class MapGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The class produces a random labyrinth or the tutorial labyrinth. The labyrinth has a small square in the center. There is only one way out of the labyrinth.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Map generator constructor.

      • createMap

        public void createMap(int size,
                      int preferredLength,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                      int numOfPairs)
        Controls all of the stages to create a random labyrinth.
        Parameters:
        size: - Length of the labyrinth sides.
        preferredLength: - Length of the route from the start to the center square.
        world: - Contains all of the collision boxes.
        numOfPairs: - Number of pairs.

        Parameters:

      • randomIndex

        public int randomIndex(int[] direction)
        Calculates the random possible direction.
        Parameters:
        direction: - Available directions array.
        Returns:
        Index of the direction.

      • makePath

        public int[][] makePath(int[][] tempPath,
                        int row,
                        int column,
                        int index,
                        int randomIndex)
        Creates an opening through the walls. It removes the wall inside it's own cell and also breaks the wall of the another cell.
        Parameters:
        tempPath: - Not finished main path.
        row: - Row of the newest cell under construction.
        column: - Column of the newest cell under construction.
        index: - The next index after this current one.
        randomIndex: - Random direction between 0 - 3, which tells which direction to break.
        Returns:
        Returns the updated path, if the current move was accepted.

      • checkTemp

        public boolean checkTemp(int[][] tempPath,
                         int row,
                         int column)
        Method checks if the next move is in bounds.
        Parameters:
        tempPath: - Path in progress.
        row: - Row of the current working cell.
        column: - Column of the current working cell.
        Returns:
        Returns the info if the move was in bounds.

      • clearPath

        public int[][] clearPath(int[][] tempPath)
        Method clears the scrubbed path, but keeps the starting locations.
        Parameters:
        tempPath: - Path that failed to make it through.
        Returns:
        Returns cleared path.

        Method merges two cells or networks together.
        Parameters:
        row: - Row of the previous cell.
        column: - Column of the previous cell.
        index: - Index of the current path.
        random: - Random direction (0-3).

      • checkPairLocations

        public boolean checkPairLocations(int R1,
                                  int C1,
                                  int R2,
                                  int C2,
                                  int[][] pairs)
        Checks if the randomly chosen locations are in bounds.
        Parameters:
        R1: - Row of the pair 1.
        C1: - Column of the pair 1.
        R2: - Row of the pair 2.
        C2: - Column of the pair 2.
        pairs: - Coordinates of the chosen pairs.
        Returns:
        Returns true, if the given coordinates are ok, and false if not.
